name: Watermark_GetWatermark
description: Enables you to preview a watermark specified by the request.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$ul: **displayAngle**: The display angle of the watermark. Valid values:
**enabled**: When **true,** the watermark will be applied to documents that are still in progress. When **false,** the watermark will not be applied.
**fontColor**: The watermark's font color. Valid values:
**fontSize**: The watermark's font size. Valid values:
**imageBase64**: The Base64 representation of the watermark image.
**transparency**: The transparency percentage of the watermark image. Valid values:

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
